message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for you. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and preferences, is worth $1000000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special price of $950000, which I believe is an exceptional deal considering its immense worth to you. I trust this offer will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
